page.title: 01Cortachy,Angus
page.content: {Cortachy}lies in an area of rich farmland surrounded by heavily wooded areas,through which flows the{River {South Esk.}Only a few houses,school and church are situated here near the gates of{Cortachy Castle. { }Half a mile to the north-west is {Dykehead}, a larger hamlet, at the junction of the {Clova}and {Prosen} roads.Here also are the post-office and a quite large hotel. Much of the land is owned by the {Earl of Airlie}and managed by{Airlie } {Estates.}It provides a living in forestry,farming and gamekeeping for many people in the surrounding area.
